PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ValveTypePressureRelief
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Spring or weight loaded valve that automatically discharges to a safe place fluid that has built up to excessive pressure in pipes or fittings. Note that a pressure relief valve is constrained to have a single port pattern.

PropertyDef.Name: ReliefPressure
PropertyDef.Definition: The pressure at which the spring or weight in the valve is set to discharge fluid
